trailingComments.value:
*
 * @desc Returns true if email is a valid email address, otherwise returns false
 * @param {string} email - an email address
 * @return {boolean} - true or false
 *
 * @example
 * 'jsmith@gmail.com', 'npraxx@123gmail.co'
